author: seungjin-yang
body:
#### PR description:
This PR adds DQM modules to monitor GE1/1 detection efficiency using GEMCSCSegment in the online DQM. It adds 36 MonitorElements for all eras and all scenarios in the online DQM. Please see [this slides](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1136226/contributions/4767246/attachments/2404268/4112480/SYang_220308_GEMEffByGEMCSCSegment.pdf) for more details.

#### PR validation:
This PR is tested with the muon gun simulation. Please check the above slides.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
none
title: Add GE1/1 detection efficiency monitor using GEMCSCSegment
